campsites.name: Club Alejandría
campsites.address: Km 15 Vía Pereira - Alcalá Vereda Dinamarca
campsites.description: Club Alejandría is a special place to spend your vacations and days of rest in the Colombian coffee region. We offer you a country hotel and camping area in the coffee region, located just 20 minutes from Pereira and 15 minutes from Panaca.

campsites.name: Ecoparque Vayjú
campsites.description: We invite you to enjoy our spectacular tourist destination, where you will find Adventure Sports, Myths and Legends Trail, Horseback Riding, Kayaking in our extensive Lake, Canopy, Climbing Wall, Cabins for Couples or Groups, Camping Area, Restaurant Service.

campsites.name: Camping Las Brisas
campsites.address: Sector Los Ceibos Vereda El Rosario
campsites.description: Enjoy comfortable well-being in our facilities. We are located in Los Ceibos, Palmira in the tourist area of El Paraiso territory, schedule, call, book and live an unforgettable rest in our Camping Area in Palmira.

campsites.name: Balneario La María
campsites.address: Vía Buga - La Habana 3 Km adelante de Crucebar
campsites.description: Come and enjoy this spectacular Spa, located in the famous sector of La María, Buga. You can enjoy a day full of fun, with its natural water pools, its spectacular slide and Garucha within the same pool. Enjoy a family stay in their Ecological Cabins.

campsites.name: Campi Hotel Guayacanes
campsites.description: Campi Hotel Guayacanes is a place for country accommodation, with the comforts of a hotel, but changing the rooms for camping sites. Enjoy its large swimming pool, pool table, toad game, ping-pong and much more.

campsites.name: Posada la Calceta
campsites.address: End of Calle Paez, Las Calcetas sector, El Rincon, Bejuma 2040
campsites.description: Combining the opportunity to connect with animals and the joy of camping, here you can fulfill your dream of becoming one with nature, let yourself go with the flow and harmonize with the ecology of our beutifully maintained botanical garden.

campsites.name: Finca la Huérfana
campsites.address: Carretera transandina Tachira via el Cobre, El Cobre 5021
campsites.description: Finca La Huérfana, a place where you can touch nature, located at 2300m AMSL, mountains all over, best for birdwatching and treking. Delicious food, and thoughtful details, everything you need to enjoy your stay.

campsites.name: Chivaton Camp
campsites.address: Via Kavanayen, Km 26 Municipio Gran Sabana, Santa Elena de Uairen 8011
campsites.description: The inn built with rocks and concrete has been built over 20 years ago by the indigenous Pemon region, the Canaima national park is an Indian reservation and only they are allowed to live in the park.
